300 meters 325 yards it s ok to use a worsted yarn too materials 5 mm hook or any hooks to meet the gauge needle scissors tape measure stitch markers pattern is written in us crochet terms 10 cm x 10 cm/ 4 x 4 = 8 row gauge chain 16 row 1 ch2 double_crochet in the second chain from hook double_crochet 14 st row 2 chain 2 turn double_crochet until the end of the row 14 st row 3-8 repeat row 2 until you ll have 8 row 14 st granny neck warmer pattern by ra in crochet 1 chain chain abbreviations double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch st stitch/stitches *----* repeat instructions from *to* as many times as stated rs right side ws wrong side this neck warmer fits an adult but you can make any other kids sizes using smaller sizing granny squares the final width is approx 38cm 15 the final length is approx 25cm 9 8 the neck s lenght is approx 30cm 11 8 this pattern is customizable and you can add extra length or width as you like try this project with another version of granny square you can find many example tips on magazines books and online follow the hashtag #grannysquareday to be inspired granny neck warmer pattern by ra in crochet 2 4ch starting with ch4 joined in a circle with slip_stitch 3dc round 1 rs ch3 counts as a double_crochet 2dc 2ch 3dc 2ch 3dc 2ch 3dc 2ch slip_stitch and fasten_off if you want to change color granny ch2 squares 3dc ch2 round 2 rs ch3 counts as a double_crochet 2dc in one of the 2ch space of previous round 3dc 2ch 3dc it s 1st corner *3dc ch2 3dc* repeat 3 times to make all the granny corners slip_stitch and fasten_off if you want to change color granny neck warmer pattern by ra in crochet 3 corner 3dc ch2 3dc round 3 rs ch3 counts as a double_crochet 2dc in one of the 2ch space of previous round 2ch 3dc it s 1st corner 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 2nd 3dc corner 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 3rd corner 3dc 3dc ch2 3dc it s 4th corner 3dc slip_stitch and fasten_off if you want to change color granny corner
